dcterms:creator: Y. Wu
J. Lim
M.-H. Yang
dcterms:description: The OTB-2013 dataset contains 51 sequences with 11 video attributes and two evaluation metrics, which are center location error and overlap ratio.
dcterms:title: OTB-2013

dcterms:creator: Y. Wu
J. Lim
M.-H. Yang
dcterms:description: The OTB-2015 dataset is the extension of OTB-2013 to 100 sequences, and is thus more challenging.
dcterms:title: OTB-2015

dcterms:creator: M. Kristan
R. Pflugfelder
A. Leonardis
J. Matas
L. Čehovin
G. Nebehay
T. Vojír
G. Fernandez
Others
dcterms:description: The VOT-2015 dataset contains 60 video sequences with per-frame annotated visual attributes. Objects are marked with rotated bounding boxes to better fit their shapes.
dcterms:title: VOT-2015

dcterms:creator: M. Kristan
A. Leonardis
J. Matas
M. Felsberg
dcterms:description: The VOT-2016 dataset uses the same sequences as in VOT-2015 but re-annotates the ground truth bounding boxes in an automatic way with per-frame segmentation masks.
dcterms:title: VOT-2016

dcterms:creator: M. Kristan
A. Leonardis
J. Matas
M. Felsberg
R. Pflugfelder
Č. Zajc
T. Vojír
G. Häger
A. Lukežić
A. Eldesokey
L. G. Fernández
Others
dcterms:description: The VOT-2017 dataset replaces the least challenging sequences in VOT-2016 with 10 new videos and manually fixes the bounding boxes that were incorrectly placed by automatic methods introduced in VOT-2016.
dcterms:title: VOT-2017
